body.p: Ordinary shares may be issued, or the number of ordinary shares outstanding may be reduced, without a corresponding change in resources. Examples include:

li.p: a capitalisation or bonus issue (sometimes referred to as a stock dividend);
a bonus element in any other issue, for example a bonus element in a rights issue to existing shareholders;
a reverse share split (consolidation of shares).
